sentences.en: Feliks looked up from Kropotkin's pamphlet.
sentences.cn: 费利克斯在一本克鲁泡特金的小册子上查看着.

sentences.en: Franklin wrote a pamphlet on the " NewInvented Pennsylvanian Fire Place ".
sentences.cn: 富兰克林写了一本小册子,论述 “ 新发明的宾夕法尼亚火炉 ”.

sentences.en: He says that I have misrepresented his views in my pamphlet.
sentences.cn: 他说我在小册子中歪曲了他的观点.

sentences.en: In his pamphlet for the AUA, This I Believe!
sentences.cn: 在他为AUA写的小册子《我信的!

sentences.en: Much of last century's newspaper was a pamphlet of opinions rather than a journal of news.
sentences.cn: 上个世纪的大多数报纸更像是一份收集意见的小册子而不是登载新闻消息的报刊.

sentences.en: Or you can receive a pamphlet if you tell your adders.
sentences.cn: 如果您留下地址的话,我们将寄一份本店的小册子给您.

sentences.en: Over a thousand copies of the pamphlet have now been given out.
sentences.cn: 现在已分发了一千多本小册子.

sentences.en: Read the directions in this small pamphlet and then follow them step by step.
sentences.cn: 读一下这本小册子的说明,然后按其中的步骤去操作.

sentences.en: Some groups rent booths to pass out pamphlet to tourists.
sentences.cn: 有些团体也租了摊位,发传单给游客们.

sentences.en: The pamphlet contains information of political opinion.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子含有关于政治主张的资料。

sentences.en: The pamphlet has been given to his pen.
The pamphlet went out in 6000 copies.
sentences.cn: 这本小册子发行了六千本.

sentences.en: The scholarly monographs were published as pamphlet.
sentences.cn: 学术专著是以小册子形式出版的.

sentences.en: They issued a pamphlet concerning the worsening environment.
sentences.cn: 他们出了一本有关环境恶化的小册子.

sentences.en: This ten - page pamphlet tells you how to care for your new car.
sentences.cn: 这本10页的小册子告诉你如何保养你的新汽车.

words.tran_cn: 小册子作者；檄文执笔者

trans.tran_en: a very thin book with paper covers, that gives information about something
